name: automationsy
description: Easy automated testing functions for beginners and advanced
author: Charles Lana

scripts.test: npm run build:test && npm run test:conf
scripts.test:all: npm run build:test && npm run test:conf --name=01 && npm run test:conf --name=02 && npm run test:conf --name=03 && npm run test:conf --name=04 && npm run test:conf --name=05 && npm run test:conf --name=06 && npm run test:conf --name=07 && npm run test:conf --name=08 && npm run test:conf --name=09 && npm run test:conf --name=10
